question: Which of the following is/are cases in which the speaker of state legislative assembly vacates his office earlier?
option1: If he ceases to be a member of the assembly
option2: If he resigns by writing to the deputy speaker
option3: If he is removed by a resolution passed by a majority of all the then members of the assembly
explanation: In the following cases the speaker of state legislative assembly vacates his office earlier: three cases: if he ceases to be a member of the assembly; if he resigns by writing to the deputy speaker; and if he is removed by a resolution passed by a majority of all the then members of the assembly.
